question:
Consider the following gases:
  1. Carbon monoxide
  2. Nitrous oxide
  3. Sulphur hexafluoride
  4. Ozone
Which of the above are green houses gases covered under Kyoto Protocol?
explanation: Six greenhouse gases have been covered by the Kyoto Protocol — carbon dioxide (CO<sub>2</sub>), methane (CH<sub>4</sub>), nitrous oxide (N<sub>2</sub>O), hydro fluorocarbons (HFCs), per fluorocarbons (PFCs), and sulphur hexafluoride (SF<sub>6</sub>).
